title: "I'm Only Human, Not God": PM Modi In Podcast Debut With Zerodha Chief Nikhil Kamath - NDTV
summary:
I'm Only Human, Not God: PM Modi In Podcast Debut With Zerodha Chief Nikhil Kamath

Publication Date: New Delhi

Source: News Article

In his debut podcast appearance on Zerodha co-founder Nikhil Kamath's show, Prime Minister Narendra Modi acknowledged his flaws, stating, 'I too can make mistakes.' He comforted Kamath over his Hindi skills, emphasizing their shared understanding.

  • Prime Minister Modi discusses his humanity and the inevitability of mistakes.
  • Nikhil Kamath expresses concerns about his language skills due to his South Indian background.
  • The podcast covers Modi’s childhood, education, and challenges faced in politics.
  • PM Modi actively engages with Kamath, making the dialogue personal and relatable.
  • Modi shared a light-hearted anecdote about his childhood chores.
'Mistakes happen, and I too can make some. I am also a human, not god.' - PM Modi

Modi shared a heartfelt message with listeners, hoping they enjoyed the podcast as much as he did creating it.
newTitle: Prime Minister Modi Reflects on Human Experience in Podcast Debut

title: 300 million-year-old hotspot linked to the formation of the Great Lakes discovered by scientists; where i - The Times of India
summary:
300 million-year-old hotspot linked to the formation of the Great Lakes discovered by scientists; where is it now?

Publication Date: N/A

Source: N/A

The discovery of a hotspot beneath the ancient supercontinent Pangaea is a significant advancement in understanding the geological history of the Great Lakes region.

  • The Cape Verde hotspot has been linked to the formation of the Great Lakes over 300 million years ago.
  • The discovery reveals how tectonic activities and glacial movements contributed to shaping the landscape.
  • Seismic anomalies indicate past deformation of the lithosphere beneath the Great Lakes region influenced by the hotspot.
“The connection between the Cape Verde hotspot and the Great Lakes adds a new layer of understanding to geological processes.”

This groundbreaking research helps to understand not just the formation of the Great Lakes, but also the broader trends in geological developments influenced by ancient hotspots.
newTitle: 300 Million-Year-Old Hotspot Linked to Formation of Great Lakes Discovered

Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro launched: Price in India, specs, and all you need to know - Hindustan Times
summary:
Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro launched: Price in India, specs, and all you need to know

Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Oppo has unveiled the Oppo Reno 13 series, featuring the Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro 5G, positioned as upper mid-range devices.

Key Points:

  • Oppo Reno 13 priced at ₹37,999 for 8GB RAM/128GB storage; 8GB RAM/256GB for ₹39,999.
  • Oppo Reno 13 Pro priced at ₹49,999 for 12GB RAM/256GB storage; 12GB RAM/512GB for ₹54,999.
  • Available in Luminous Blue and Ivory White (Reno 13) and Mist Lavender and Graphite Grey (Reno 13 Pro).
  • Ships starting January 11 via Oppo's website and Flipkart.
  • Both models feature MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset with varying RAM and storage options.
  • Display: Reno 13 Pro has a 6.83-inch AMOLED, Reno 13 has a 6.59-inch display, both with 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Camera: Reno 13 Pro has a triple setup (50MP main, 50MP telephoto, 8MP ultrawide); Reno 13 has a 50MP main, 8MP ultrawide, and 2MP monochrome.
  • Battery: Reno 13 Pro has a 5800mAh battery with 80W fast charging; Reno 13 has a 5600mAh battery with similar charging.

Notable Quotes:

“Both phones offer instant bank discounts of 10%.”

Conclusion:

The launch of the Oppo Reno 13 series enhances Oppo's mid-range offerings, with competitive pricing and specifications appealing to a wide audience.
newTitle: Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro launched: Price in India, specs, and all you need to know

title: What to drink for weight loss? Nutritionist shares 5 detox beverages to reduce fat - Hindustan Times
summary:
What to drink for weight loss? Nutritionist shares 5 detox beverages to reduce fat

Jan 10, 2025 02:20 PM IST - Hindustan Times

Hydration is crucial when trying to lose weight. The article emphasizes the importance of detox drinks, which provide natural goodness while being low in calories.

Key Points:

  • Importance of hydration in weight loss.
  • Detox water is low in calories and energizing.
  • 5 detox drinks recommended: Methi water, Fennel water, Cinnamon orange infusion, CFC tea (Coriander, fennel, and cumin), Tulsi and ginger root boost.
  • Benefits of detox water include detoxifying the body, adding electrolytes, vitamins, and minerals.
  • Experts highlight benefits such as improving metabolism and digestion.
“Detox water has a lot of benefits minus calories. These fruits add electrolytes, vitamins, and minerals [to water] and keep your body hydrated.” - Nutritionist Kavita Devgan

This article provides insights into how detox beverages can support weight loss and overall wellness.
newTitle: Detox Beverages for Weight Loss: 5 Refreshing Recipes from a Nutritionist

OnePlus 13 goes on sale in India today: First sale offers, price, specs and more | Mint - Mint
summary:
OnePlus 13 goes on sale in India today: First sale offers, price, specs and more

Date: January 10, 2023

Source: Live Mint

The OnePlus 13 has officially launched in India, featuring several promotional offers including significant bank discounts and exchange bonuses.

Key Specifications:

  • 6.82-inch 120Hz ProXDR LPTO 4.1 AMOLED display with peak brightness of 4,500 nits.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor with up to 24GB of RAM and 1TB storage.
  • 6,000mAh battery supporting 100W wired and 50W wireless charging.
  • Triple 50MP camera setup with Hasselblad branding; 32MP front camera.
  • Runs on OxygenOS 15 based on Android 15 with long-term update promises.
  • Available in Midnight Ocean, Black Eclipse, and Arctic Dawn colors.
“OnePlus is offering ₹5,000 instant discount for ICICI Bank credit card users, making the effective price for the models ₹64,999, ₹71,999, and ₹84,999.”

The new flagship model starts at ₹69,999 for the 12GB RAM/256GB storage variant and will be available across various platforms including OnePlus's website and Amazon.
newTitle: OnePlus 13 Launches in India with Attractive Offers

Hammer attack at Tokyo's Hosei University leaves eight injured; woman arrested - The Times of India
summary:
Hammer attack at Tokyo's Hosei University leaves eight injured; woman arrested

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

An attack involving a hammer at Hosei University in Tokyo has resulted in injuries to eight people, prompting the arrest of a female suspect.

  • The incident occurred on a university campus, which was heavily populated at the time.
  • The attack appears to be unprovoked and unexpected.
  • Authorities are conducting an investigation to understand the motive behind the attack.
  • Emergency services were dispatched promptly to treat the injured.
Witnesses reported frightening scenes as the attack unfolded, with many students fleeing the area.

This shocking event has raised concerns about safety in educational institutions and the mental health of individuals within the community.
newTitle: Hammer attack at Tokyo's Hosei University leaves eight injured; woman arrested

summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim likely to join the Galaxy S25 lineup

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: India Today

Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy S25 series, including the anticipated Galaxy S25 Slim, at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on January 22.

  • The Galaxy S25 Slim might be introduced alongside the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra.
  • Rumored model number for the Slim is SM-S937B, complementing other models in the series.
  • Specifications suggest a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, Android 15, and a low multi-core score of 6,945.
  • Expected features include a design under 7mm thick, a 6.7-inch QHD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and a powerful camera setup.
If the Galaxy S25 Slim arrives, it will be a potential competitor to Apple's rumored iPhone 17 Air, expected to feature a thin profile.

The Galaxy S25 Slim promises to offer impressive features and design, catering to consumers looking for a sleek smartphone experience.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim likely to join the Galaxy S25 lineup

title: Rashmika Mandanna suffers gym injury, temporarily halts filming of Salman Khan's Sikandar - Hindustan Times
summary:
Rashmika Mandanna pauses shooting schedule of Salman Khan's Sikandar as she sustains a gym injury

Date: Jan 10, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Rashmika Mandanna has been riding high on success with blockbusters but recently suffered a gym injury, leading to a temporary pause in her filming schedule for Sikandar.

  • Rashmika sustained a gym injury and is currently recovering.
  • The injury has caused a temporary halt in the filming of Sikandar, starring Salman Khan.
  • She is advised to take a short break for complete recovery.
  • Rashmika will resume shooting once doctors give clearance.
“Rashmika recently sustained an injury in the gym and has been recovering well by resting.”

Despite the injury causing concern among fans, she is expected to return to filming shortly.
newTitle: Rashmika Mandanna suffers gym injury, temporarily halts filming of Salman Khan's Sikandar

title: Vodafone Increases Stake in Vi to 24.39 Percent After Completing Share Placing in Indus - TelecomTalk
summary:
Vodafone Boosts Stake in Vi to 24.39% with Indus Towers Share Placing

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Telecom Talk

Vodafone Group Plc announced it has increased its stake in Vodafone Idea Limited (Vi) following a financial transaction involving Indus Towers that secured Vodafone's obligations.

  • Vodafone invested Rs 19.1 billion to raise its stake in Vi to 24.39 percent.
  • Rs 8.9 billion was allocated to repay borrowings and transaction fees.
  • The funds enabled Vi to settle its Master Service Agreement dues with Indus Towers.
"Vi have used the proceeds from this Capital Raise to pay outstanding Master Service Agreement (MSA) dues to Indus. Following this, Vodafone's obligations to Indus under the Security Arrangements have now been satisfied in full," Vodafone stated.

This strategic move allows Vodafone to enhance its stake in the competitive telecom market while fulfilling financial commitments to Indus Towers.
newTitle: Vodafone Boosts Stake in Vi to 24.39% with Indus Towers Share Placing

Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India with Snapdragon processor and 144 Hz display - The Hindu
summary:
Xiaomi Pad 7 Launched in India Featuring Snapdragon Processor and 144 Hz Display

Published on: January 10, 2025 Source: The Hindu

Xiaomi has officially launched the Pad 7 in India, featuring a powerful Snapdragon processor and various accessories.

  • The Pad 7 includes a Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 processor with up to 12 GB RAM and 256 GB storage.
  • It features an 11.2-inch display with a 144 Hz refresh rate and peak brightness of 800 nits.
  • The tablet is powered by an 8,850 mAh battery with a 45 W fast charger included.
  • Camera specifications include a 13 MP rear camera and an 8 MP front camera.
  • Available colors are Graphite Grey, Sage Green, and Mirage Purple.
  • Pricing: Starts at ₹27,999 for the 8 GB/128 GB model, going up to ₹32,999 for the nano texture display edition.
“The Xiaomi Pad 7 brings next-gen AI features like writing, drawing, and summarizing.”

The new tablet will be available for purchase starting January 13, 2025.
newTitle: Xiaomi Pad 7 Launched in India Featuring Snapdragon Processor and 144 Hz Display

Ram Charan's Game Changer: Why Naanaa Hyraanaa Song Isn't Included & When It Will Get Added To The Runtime - Filmibeat
summary:
Ram Charan's Game Changer: Why Naanaa Hyraanaa Song Isn't Included & When It Will Get Added To The Runtime

Publication Date: January 10, 2025
Source: Filmibeat

Ram Charan, Kiara Advani, and Shankar's film Game Changer debuted worldwide on January 10. The film has received mixed reviews and has been released in three languages featuring Ram Charan in a dual role.

  • The film released as the first major Tollywood release for the Sankranthi festival.
  • Ram Charan plays Ram Nandan IAS, facing political challenges in Visakhapatnam.
  • The bustling and technically advanced song Naanaa Hyraanaa is not included in the initial release due to processing issues.
  • The song will be added to the runtime starting January 14.
“The song was shot using about Rs 27 Crore and is the first Indian song filmed with an infrared camera.”

Despite initial setbacks, Game Changer has set the stage for an exciting inclusion with its unique song Naanaa Hyraanaa, promising to enhance the cinematic experience moving forward.
newTitle: Ram Charan's Game Changer: Release Details and Naanaa Hyraanaa Song Inclusion

title: Supreme Court disallows puja at Sambhal Jama Masjid's well - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
summary:
Supreme Court Disallows Puja at Sambhal Jama Masjid's Well

Publication Date: Recent

Source: Legal News

An application from the mosque committee was addressed in court, arguing against the Sambhal District administration's proposal to allow public access to a well near the mosque, which the committee claims is being misrepresented as a historical Hindu site.

  • The mosque committee argued that promoting the well as a site for Hindu prayers could disturb local harmony.
  • Senior Advocate Huzefa Ahmadi presented the case, highlighting concerns over the administration's notice referring to the site as Hari Mandir.
  • The Supreme Court issued an interim order to not give effect to the notice until further review.
  • The Court aims to maintain peace and harmony amidst the brewing dispute.
“Opening the same for Hindu prayers will result in mischief and disturb the fragile harmony and peace in the area at the moment.”

This ruling reflects ongoing tensions in the area and emphasizes the Court's role in pre-emptive measures to maintain public order.
newTitle: Supreme Court Disallows Puja at Sambhal Jama Masjid's Well

title: Delhi election: Kejriwal offers to sponsor private guards hired by RWAs in latest poll perk - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kejriwal Offers to Sponsor Private Guards Hired by RWAs in Latest Poll Perk

Published on January 10, 2025 by HT News Desk

The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) has announced a new initiative aimed at securing support in the upcoming Delhi assembly elections by offering financial support for Resident Welfare Associations (RWAs) to hire private guards.

  • Arvind Kejriwal announced funding for private security for RWAs if AAP wins the elections.
  • This move is part of a broader strategy to counter anti-incumbency sentiments.
  • Additional welfare schemes announced include a ₹2,100 monthly honorarium for women and free healthcare for the elderly.
  • The elections will take place on February 5, with counting on February 8.
“It is a single-phase election... we have deliberately kept polling on a Wednesday so more people come out to vote,” – CEC Rajiv Kumar.

The upcoming election will be crucial for AAP as it seeks a third consecutive term amid increasing competition from BJP and Congress.
newTitle: Kejriwal Promises Security Perk for RWAs in Delhi Elections
